content:
# I have successfully returned to the stone furnace's position.
# 
# I will now retrieve the stone furnace entity again and insert coal into it to keep the smelting process running smoothly.

stone_furnace = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}, position=Position(x=-7.0, y=7.0))[0]  # Retrieve the stone furnace entity.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=stone_furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting 5 coal into the stone furnace for fuel.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
